DOC.brief_title: The Application of Evidence-Based Chinese Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) in Hospice Palliative Care in Taiwan
DOC.detailed_description: The study aims to explore the effects of silver spike point treatment on common symptoms including pain, breathlessness, nausea/vomiting, dry mouth etc. of terminal cancer patients. We will conducted a pilot study to evaluate the effects on different symptoms and then a prospective study will be conducted after validation of major effects.
DOC.criteria: Cancer patients Competent with clear consciousness With symptoms of pain, breathlessness, nause/vomiting, dry mouth, generalized discomfort Expected life span of at least 1 week With implanted devices Not having clear consciousness Expected life span less than 1 week Foreigner
